about_the_game:
This pack unlocks 26 new furniture items to craft in the Art Deco style, including a vault, fireplace, chandelier, vases and more. These can be crafted on the Decorations Bench at level 20 (and require Gold Ingots, Platinum Weave and Steel to craft):

  • 4 Art Deco Dining Room Furniture Pieces
  • 17 Art Deco Lounge Furniture Pieces
  • 5 Art Deco Bedroom Furniture Pieces
detailed_description:
THIS SUPPORTS OUR PROJECT

Our DLC was made to provide a way for those who enjoy the project to further support it, and in return receive some simple new content. This content is not essential for the game. Consider purchasing this if you want to further provide financial support to the development of Icarus.


About the Game

This pack unlocks 26 new furniture items to craft in the Art Deco style, including a vault, fireplace, chandelier, vases and more. These can be crafted on the Decorations Bench at level 20 (and require Gold Ingots, Platinum Weave and Steel to craft):

  • 4 Art Deco Dining Room Furniture Pieces
  • 17 Art Deco Lounge Furniture Pieces
  • 5 Art Deco Bedroom Furniture Pieces
name: Icarus: Art Deco Furniture Pack

short_description: Decorate your base with our Art Deco furniture pack. Featuring a range of new furniture and decorations to bring an art deco aesthetic to the base of your dreams. Support our continued development and add some style to your home.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
